title: Escaping the sad AI internet
description: Chaos and overwhelm now define many people’s experience on the internet — whether they know it or not. We’re flooded with short-form video and pinged constantly with breaking news. Many people, especially Gen A and Gen Z, are swiping and scrolling all day long. The lines between digital leisure and news consumption are fuzzy. You...
